attributes.action: punish with imprisonment any politician or councilor who is found to have lied to the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to restore faith in the democratic institutions of the United Kingdom, and in particular in the honesty and integrity of our elected representatives, any politician or county councillor who is proven to have knowingly lied in their capacity as a publicly elected representative should face permanent dismissal from their job, a minimum of three years imprisonment in a category-A prison and the loss of all of their pension entitlement.
